00019 MainWindow::MainWindow(QWidget* parent)
00020     : QMainWindow(parent)
00021 {
00022     setupUi(this);
00023 
00024     /* center the window */
00025     QRect rect = QApplication::desktop()->availableGeometry(this);
00026     move(rect.center() - this->rect().center());
00027 
00028     //_clipboard = QApplication::clipboard();
00029 
00030     m_hasImageLoaded = false;
00031     tabWidget->clear();
00032     tabWidget->addTab(new ImageWidget(tabWidget), QString("No image selected"));
00033 
00034     connectSignals();
00035 }
00036 
00037 MainWindow::~MainWindow()
00038 {
00039     foreach(Image* image, m_imageMap)
00040     {
00041         delete(image);
00042     }
00043     delete(contextMenu);
00044 }
00045 
00046 void MainWindow::addImageTab(Image* img)
00047 {
00048     closeTabByName(img->shortName());
00049 
00050     ImageWidget* w;
00051     if(!m_hasImageLoaded)
00052     {
00053         w = (ImageWidget*)tabWidget->currentWidget();
00054         w->setPixmap(*img);
00055         tabWidget->setTabText(tabWidget->currentIndex(), img->shortName());
00056     }
00057     else
00058     {
00059         w = new ImageWidget(tabWidget);
00060         w->setPixmap(*img);
00061         tabWidget->addTab(w, img->shortName());
00062     }
00063     w->setContextMenu(contextMenu);
00064     closeTabButton->setVisible(true);
00065     m_imageMap[img->shortName()]=img;
00066     setEnabledImageActions(true);
00067     m_hasImageLoaded = true;
00068     tabWidget->setCurrentIndex(tabWidget->count()-1);
00069 }
00070 
00071 void MainWindow::closeCurrentTab()
00072 {
00073 
00074     if(tabWidget->count()==1)
00075     {
00076         m_hasImageLoaded = false;
00077         setEnabledImageActions(false);
00078         closeTabButton->setVisible(false);
00079     }
00080     tabWidget->removeTab(tabWidget->currentIndex());
00081 
00082     if(!m_hasImageLoaded)
00083         tabWidget->addTab(new ImageWidget(tabWidget), "No image selected");
00084 }
00085 
00086 void MainWindow::closeTabByName(QString name)
00087 {
00088     if( !m_imageMap.contains(name) )
00089         return;
00090 
00091     int i =0;
00092     while(i<tabWidget->count())
00093     {
00094         if(tabWidget->tabText(i)==name)
00095         {
00096             tabWidget->removeTab(i);
00097             delete(m_imageMap[name]);
00098             m_imageMap.remove(name);
00099             return;
00100         }
00101         i++;
00102     }
00103 }
00104 
00105 void MainWindow::setEnabledImageActions(const bool value)
00106 {
00107     decodeButton->setEnabled(value);
00108     actionDecode->setEnabled(value);
00109     encodeButton->setEnabled(value);
00110     actionEncode->setEnabled(value);
00111     propertyButton->setEnabled(value);
00112     actionProperty->setEnabled(value);
00113     actionProperty->setEnabled(value);
00114     actionCloseCurrent->setEnabled(value);
00115 }

00117 void MainWindow::dragEnterEvent(QDragEnterEvent *event)
00118 {
00119     if (event->mimeData()->hasUrls())
00120         event->acceptProposedAction();
00121 }
00122 
00123 void MainWindow::dropEvent(QDropEvent *event)
00124 {
00125     if(event->mimeData()->hasUrls())
00126     {
00127         QList<QUrl> urls = event->mimeData()->urls();
00128         for(int i=0; i<urls.size(); i++)
00129         {
00130             if(urls.at(i).toLocalFile().length()>0)
00131                 newImage(urls.at(i).toLocalFile());
00132         }
00133     }
00134     else
00135     {
00136         QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Warning"),
00137                              "The dropped object doesn't have any url.");
00138     }
00139 
00140 }
00141 
00142 Image* MainWindow::currentImage()
00143 {
00144     QString key = tabWidget->tabText(tabWidget->currentIndex());
00145     if(m_imageMap.contains(key))
00146         return m_imageMap[key];
00147     else
00148         return NULL;
00149 }
00150 
00151 void MainWindow::newImage(QString url)
00152 {
00153     if(QFile::exists(url))
00154     {
00155         Image* img = new Image(url);
00156         if(img->isNull())
00157         {
00158             QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Warning"),
00159                                  "Cannot load '"+url+"'\n file is not a valid image.");
00160             delete(img);
00161             return;
00162         }
00163         addImageTab(img);
00164     }
00165     else
00166         qWarning() << "Cannot load '" << url << "'\n file doesn't exist !";
00167 }
00168 
00169 void MainWindow::openFile()
00170 {
00171     setCursor(Qt::WaitCursor);
00172     QFileDialog dialog(this, tr("Open Images"));
00173     dialog.setFilter(tr("Image Files (*.png *.jpg .jpeg *.bmp)"));
00174     dialog.setViewMode(QFileDialog::List);
00175     dialog.setFileMode(QFileDialog::ExistingFiles);
00176     dialog.setDirectory(QDir::homePath());
00177     if(dialog.exec())
00178     {
00179         QStringList fileNames = dialog.selectedFiles();
00180         for(int i=0; i<fileNames.size(); i++)
00181         {
00182             newImage(fileNames.at(i));
00183         }
00184     }
00185     setCursor(Qt::ArrowCursor);
00186 }

00188 void MainWindow::execPropertyDialog()
00189 {
00190     propertyDialog.setImage(currentImage());
00191     propertyDialog.exec();
00192 }

00206 void MainWindow::connectSignals()
00207 {
00208     // Button actions
00209     connect(encodeButton, SIGNAL(pressed()), this, SLOT(execEncodeDialog()));
00210     connect(actionEncode, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(execEncodeDialog()));
00211     connect(propertyButton, SIGNAL(pressed()), this, SLOT(execPropertyDialog()));
00212     connect(actionProperty, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(execPropertyDialog()));
00213     connect(decodeButton, SIGNAL(pressed()), this, SLOT(execDecodeDialog()));
00214     connect(actionDecode, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(execDecodeDialog()));
00215 
00216     // Menu actions
00217     connect(actionOpen, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(openFile()));
00218     // connect(actionCopy, SIGNAL(triggered()), ..., ...);
00219     // connect(actionPaste, SIGNAL(triggered()), ..., ...);
00220     connect(actionCloseCurrent, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(closeCurrentTab()));
00221     connect(actionPreferences, SIGNAL(triggered()), &preferenceDialog, SLOT(exec()));
00222     connect(actionAbout, SIGNAL(triggered()), &aboutDialog, SLOT(exec()));
00223 
00224     // Others
00225     connect(&encodeDialog, SIGNAL(encodedImage(QString)), this, SLOT(newImage(QString)));
00226 
00227     contextMenu = new QMenu(this);
00228     contextMenu->addAction(actionCloseCurrent);
00229     contextMenu->addSeparator();
00230     contextMenu->addAction(actionEncode);
00231     contextMenu->addAction(actionDecode);
00232     contextMenu->addAction(actionProperty);
00233 
00234     // close tab button
00235     closeTabButton = new QPushButton(this);
00236     closeTabButton->setIcon(QIcon(":/menu/img/close.png"));
00237     closeTabButton->setFlat(true);
00238     tabWidget->setCornerWidget(closeTabButton);
00239     closeTabButton->setVisible(false);
00240     connect(closeTabButton, SIGNAL(pressed()), this, SLOT(closeCurrentTab()));
00241 }
